column2:
07:14 GMT
William spotted him the moment he entered the terminal. A dark blue double-breasted blazer, white shirt, and striped tie. The commander probably slept in double-breasted pajamas.
I jump onto Rocker to look at Watch, he says 07:14. I can skateboard on Rocker without holding on to her, then I whee back onto Duvet and Iâ€™m snowboarding instead.
At 7.14 Harry knew he was alive. He knew that because the pain could be felt in every nerve fibre.
